SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Add read action, URL and skip SSL validation to java arguments
: SET &UC4RB_VER_CMD# = 'java -jar VeracodeJavaAPI.jar' : SET &UC4RB_VER_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VER_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! Base URL : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_VER_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_ZOS.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_VER_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VER_CMD#, " -vuser &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
